extraDescriptions.li: This apparel is quite thin. It is easier to penetrate and doesn't insulate as well.
This apparel is quite thick. It has additional cold insulation, and it is harder to penetrate.
This apparel is quite flimsy. It looks like it can easily be torn apart.
This apparel is quite tough and harder to tear apart.
This apparel is very tough and much harder to tear apart.
This apparel is quite stiff and rigid. It restricts movement, but protects slightly against blunt attacks.
This apparel is quite flexible and it doesn't restrict movement.
This apparel was strengthened to make it a bit more protective.
This apparel was reinforced with additional material to enchance its protection.
This apparel was reinforced with additional material and it offers significantly more protection.
This apparel is quite lightweight.
This apparel is so incredibly lightweight that you almost can't feel it during movement.
This apparel is slightly more heavy. It slows you down a little bit but offers a small amount of additional protection.
This apparel is quite heavy. While it may slow you down, it offers additional protection.
This apparel is very heavy and will slow you down, but it protects well, especially from blunt attacks.
The mini version is lighter and less protective.
This apparel is quite ugly and makes people less attractive.
This apparel looks pretty and might make the user a bit more attractive.
This apparel was decorated with a pattern. It looks pretty and makes the user a bit more attractive.
This apparel shines in light. It looks pretty and people tend to pay more attention to the user.
This apparel is decorated with glitter to look prettier. It sparkles on light, attracting attention.
This apparel is beautiful and makes the user look more attractive.
This apparel looks cute.
This apparel is stylish.
This apparel is goregous and makes the user look very attractive.
This apparel is quite uncomfortable and not very pleasant to walk in.
This apparel is quite comfortable and pleasant to walk in.
This apparel is warm and cosy.
This apparel isn't as good for cold insulation.
This apparel insulates from cold a bit better.
This apparel is good at insulating from cold and heat.
This apparel is quite dirty and covered in germs.
This apparel is very clean. It is pleasant to look at and doesn't catch germs as easily.
This apparel was sanitized for better hygiene.
This apparel was disinfected from germs.
This apparel is completely sterile and free from germs.
This apparel was made in a rush and as a result it is slightly worse in most ways.
This apparel is very tight-fitting. It can be uncomfortable to wear and doesn't dampen blunt damage, but you can move faster in it.
This apparel is too loose and baggy.
This weapon is quite small and deals less damage, but is slightly easier to handle, although size makes it harder to hit.
This weapon is quite small and slightly harder to hit with due to smaller reach, but it is a bit easier to handle.
This weapon is tiny and can barely do any damage.
This weapon is tiny and does less damage, but you can hit rapidly.
This weapon is quite big and does more damage but it is harder to handle.
This weapon is quite big and the increased reach makes it easier to land hits.
This weapon is large, dealing a lot damage, although it is very heavy and hard to handle.
This weapon is large and the increased reach makes it easier to land hits, but the weight makes attacks slower.
This weapon is enormous and can do significant amounts of damage. While it has longer reach, it is very hard to handle due to huge weight.
This weapon is enormous and the increased reach makes it easier to land hits, but the weight makes attacks much slower.
This weapon looks like it was made for giants. It can do extreme damage due to the huge weight, but its is extremely slow to swing and hard to carry.
This weapon looks like it was made for giants. It can do major damage due to huge weight and the increased reach makes it easier to land hits, but its is extremely slow to swing and hard to carry.
This weapon is lightweight and does less damage, but it is easier to handle.
This weapon is lightweight and easy to handle.
This weapon weighs almost nothing and can barely do any damage despite being able to hit very rapidly.
This weapon weighs almost nothing and it is significantly easier to handle and swing, allowing to attack very rapidly.
This weapon is slightly heavier can do more damage.
This weapon is slightly heavier than usual and harder to handle.
This weapon is quite heavy and can do more damage.
This weapon too heavy. While it might do sligtly more damage, it is hard to swing.
This weapon is extremely heavy and can do massive damage, although it isn't easy to handle
This weapon was made too heavy and hard to handle due to weird shape. While it might do more damage on hit, landing a hit will be very hard.
This weapon was made too heavy and hard to handle.
This weapon has a weird shape and it is harder to handle.
This weapon has a weirdly shaped handle and it is hard to grip.
This weapon is quite easy to grip and handle.
This weapon is quite easy to grip and handle.
This weapon is quite short, making it harder to reach and hit with and it.
This weapon is quite short, making it harder to reach and hit with.
This weapon is slightly longer, making it a bit easier to reach and hit with.
This weapon is slightly longer, making it a bit easier to reach and hit with.
This weapon is quite long, making it easier to reach and hit with.
This weapon is quite long, making it easier to reach and hit with.
This weapon is too blunt and does less damage. Sometimes it will cause blunt damage.
This weapon was sharpened and does a bit more damage.
This weapon is quite sharp and does more damage.
This weapon is very sharp and does much more damage.
This weapon has a jagged, sawlike edge, increasing the damage and bleeding.
This weapon is quite harsh and deal less damage but causes significantly more bleeding.
This weapon has a decreased rate of fire.
This weapon has a slightly increased rate of fire.
This weapon has a moderately increased rate of fire.
This weapon was overclocked and has significantly increased rate of fire, however overclocking reduces accuracy.
This weapon fires weaker projectiles with smaller force, dealing less damage.
This weapon fires bigger projectiles with stronger force, dealing more damage.
This weapon is quite light and does less damage, but it is easier to handle.
This weapon is quite heavy and does more damage, but it takes more time to aim.
This weapon was shortened, making it more effective up-close and less effective at distance.
This weapon was elongated, making it more effective at distance and less effective up-close.
This weapon is quite inaccurate and hard to land shots with.
This weapon is quite accurate and easy to land shots with.
This weapon quite small and does less damage, but it fires quicker.
This weapon too small and does little damage, although it fires quite fast.
This weapon is quite big and does more damage, but fires slower.
This weapon is large and does more damage, but fires slower.
This weapon is enormous and does more damage, but it is hard to handle and fires significantly slower.
This shield can't hold as much energy.
This shield can hold slightly more energy.
This shield can hold more energy.
This shield recharges slower.
This shield recharges slightly faster.
This shield uses quick-charge technology to recharge faster.
This shield can recharge very fast.
This shield is lighter and holds less energy but recharges faster.
This shield is heavier and holds more energy but recharges slower.
This shield is designed for heavy duty tasks and holds twice as much energy, but recharges much slower.
This weapon is too loud and scares animals away.
This weapon fires with less sound. Animals are less likely to notice the user.
This weapon is almost silent. Animals are significantly less likely to notice the user.
